content: अभीवर्तः [वृत्-करणे घञ्] {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a Sāman, {%Brahma Sāman%}. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a hymn (<ls>Rv. 10. 174</ls>) recited in attacking the enemy. {@--3@} A year. {@--4@} A sort of oblation (<ls>B. and R.</ls> take this word to mean ‘existing everywhere’, ‘attacking successfully’, ‘successful attack or victory.’)
